De...Regular price $1,500.00Regular priceUnit price per Inspired Healing Commitment Dr. Sebi's Cell Food continues the arduous work of Dr. Sebi and his vision for serving communities and individuals that need health-enhancing, plant-based products and information. Everyone who works at Dr. Sebi's Cell food was personally selected and trained by Dr. Sebi himself, and are committed to ensuring his legacy lives on. Our products are 100% natural and use the formulas Dr.Sebi devised, which have remained unchanged. Together, we aim to honestly and meaningfully share nature's ability to heal and nourish the mind and body. Method Dr. Sebi's spent three decades researching ancient botanical wisdom to create an effective system to restore the body to optimal health and wellness. Drawing inspiration from the ancient wisdom of different cultures, Dr. Sebi's Cell Food promotes a plant-based alkaline diet and non-toxic lifestyle in harmony with nature.
